answers.answer: Im due Feb 7th also with my 2nd. My pregnancy has been very rough, complete opposite from my  10 year old. With my age and gestational diabetes I get lots of ultrasounds and love seeing the baby. Everytime I get one though the baby keeps their legs close so Dr. is 75% sure it's a girl. Im praying for my girl.
Im doing good. Still have morning sickness. I'm due on the 22nd. I go in on October 4th and we will find out what we are having!!
Im due valentines day.. Goin in sept 19 to find out what we ae having cant wait :))
I'm due Feb 22nd with a little girl... So excited to give my son a little sister... Pregnancy so far is good ..just feel nauseous a lot ..
im due feb 13 with my first. find on gender on sept 25th. so excited :) not the easiest pregnancy, but this mamas standing strong :)

question: How are your pregnancies going so far? When are you due?For the most part my pregnancy is going good. I had to get my back realigned last week though. When I go in on the 20th of September they will schedule my first and only ultrasound. So I am deff excited. I am due February 9th with my second! :)
title: February mommies
